SEARCH
Module photos
Package com.photos.models

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.photos.models.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
A model representing a serializable User. Uses the singleton pattern to maintain a single user at all times. Consists of a username, a list of albums, and associated tags.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • instance

      private static User instance
      The current user instance (singleton pattern). See generateInstance(String). for more information.

    • STORE_DIR

      public static final String STORE_DIR
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • username

      private final String username
      The name of the user. We say this is a unique and sufficient identifier for the user as no two users can share a name. Note, admin is a reserved username

    • albumList

      private final List<Album> albumList
      List of albums that the current User instance owns

    • tagMap

      private transient ObservableMap<String,Boolean> tagMap
      Map of tags in format <tagname, isMultivalued>

    • searchPhotos

      public List<Photo> searchPhotos(Predicate<Photo> predicate)
      Flatmap all Album into Photo, allowing one to search for all photos based on some predicate
      Parameters:
      predicate - Predicate based on a Photo
      Returns:
      The list of search results

    • generateInstance

      public static void generateInstance(String username)
      Uses the Singleton pattern to only allow one User instance to exist at a time
      Parameters:
      username - Username of currently logged in user

    • getInstance

      public static User getInstance()
      Returns:
      instance

    • deleteInstance

      public static void deleteInstance()
      Deletes the current instance of the singleton. Will need to run generateInstance(String) again if need to use getInstance()

    • writeObject

      private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream out) throws IOException
      Saves the state of the User instance to a stream (that is, serializes it).
      Parameters:
      out - the output stream
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • readObject

      private void readObject(ObjectInputStream in) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Reconstitutes the User instance from a stream (that is, deserializes it).
      Parameters:
      in - the input stream
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class of a serialized object could not be found
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • writeUser

      public static void writeUser()
      Serializes the current User as dictated by generateInstance(String) and getInstance(). Will also serialize its Albums, Photos, and available tags
      See Also:
      • readUser(String)

    • readUser

      private static User readUser(String username)
      Attempts to search for a User from data/user/username.dat to generate the singleton instance
      Parameters:
      username - Username of currently logged in User
      Returns:
      The instance of the saved User or a new empty User if username.dat was not found
